name: Blast One Standing
description:
This is a block pushing game with a unique win condition: destroy all but one block. Start a blast by pushing a block which is connected to another block.

Controls: 

  • Z is undo
  • R is restart
  • WASD or arrow keys for movement 
  • ESC exits to the level select or menu
  • M is mute

This is a collaborative game made by members of the Thinky Puzzle Games Discord server, from July 22nd 2022 to March 9th 2023. The format was an "exquisite corpse" style, where each person adds on a little bit (a level, a mechanic, and/or polish), and then passes it on.

The exported game uses pancelor's level select fork of Puzzlescript.  You can play externally and see the source code at https://pancelor.com/PuzzleScript/play.html?p=739c....
